glsa.title: Cherokee: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Cherokee, the worst of which could result in a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Cherokee is an extra-light web server.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Cherokee. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: Gentoo has discontinued support for Cherokee. We recommend that users unmerge package:
